pkgmetadata.longdescription: Econometric Analysis of Explosive Time Series // Testing for and dating periods of explosive dynamics (exuberance) in time series using recursive unit root tests as proposed by Phillips, P. C., Shi, S. and Yu, J. (2015a) doi:10.1111/iere.12132. Simulate a variety of periodically-collapsing bubble models. The estimation and simulation utilizes the matrix inversion lemma from the recursive least squares algorithm, which results in a significant speed improvement.
